login_bottom_text: Döviz ve CFD ticareti önemli bir risk içerir ve yatırım yapılan tüm sermayenin kaybedilmesine neden olabilir
email_changed_text: ${BrandName} hesabınızla ilişkilendirilmiş e-posta adresini artık kullanmıyorsanız, hesabınıza erişimi geri yüklemek için Müşteri Hizmetleri ile iletişime geçebilirsiniz.
usCitizen_text: Vergi amaçlı olarak Amerika Birleşik Devletleri vatandaşı veya ABD Cebelitarık, Guernsey, Isle of Man Jersey vatandaşı mısınız?
assesment_text_top: Mevcut yasal ve düzenleyici gereklilikleri yerine getirmek için, ilgili deneyiminiz ve yatırım ürünleri bilginiz hakkında biraz bilgi sahibi olmamız gerekmektedir.
banktransfer_instructions: Lütfen aşağıdaki ayrıntılı bağlantı talimatlarını inceleyin. Size kolaylık sağlaması ve bankanızın transferi başlatması için, bunları yazdırabilir ve bankanıza sunabilirsiniz.
have_prior_education: Önceden eğitim veya tecrübeniz var mı?
totalVolume: Lütfen daha önce ayda bir kez gerçekleştirilen yukarıdaki ürünlerdeki toplam işlem hacmini belirtin (ortalama):
professionalExperience: CFD riskini anlamada size yardımcı olacak deneyime veya niteliklere sahip misiniz?
employerRefrences: Referans için işvereninize ile iletişime geçmeyeceğiz
atv: Ulaşmak istediğiniz aylık ortalama işlem hacmi nedir?
us_citizen: ABD’de rapor edilebilir bir Vatandaş mısınız?
useCharacters: En az 6 karakterli, sayı ve harflerden oluşan bir kombinasyon kullanmak en iyisidir
samePassword: Daha önce bizimle kullandığınız şifreyi kullanmayın.
usePersonalDetails: Sözlük kelimeleri, adınızı, e-posta adresinizi, cep telefon numaranızı veya kolayca elde edilebilecek diğer kişisel bilgileri kullanmayın.
bankAccountInfoText: Lütfen bankanız ile ilgili bilgileri aşağı giriniz
withdrawCommentsText: Yorumlar (eğer bankanız aracı kurum banka bilgilerini verirse veya uluslararası fon transferleri için Şube Adı ve Şube Numarası isterse, lütfen bu bilgileri aşağıda belirtin).
verificationAuthenticate: Kimliğinizi, ödeme yönteminizi ve adresinizi doğrulayarak hesabınızı doğrulayın.
verificationCamera: Devam etmek için, gerekli belgelerin fotoğraflarını telefon kameranız ile çekin veya direkt yükleyin
verificationProtected: Bilgileriniz tarafımızdan korumakta ve güvence altına alınmaktadır. Sadece kimliğinizi doğrulamak amacıyla özel olarak tutulmaktadırlar
selectOne: Yüklemek için aşağıdaki belgelerden BİRİNİ seçin
choose_document: Bir belge türü seçin ve buna göre yükleyin
new: Bit fotoğraf çek ya da yükle
file_is_big_or_small: Dosya çok büyük veya çok küçük. Lütfen 10 MB'tan küçük ve 10 KB'den büyük bir dosya seçin
file_incorrect_type: Yanlış dosya tipi. Lütfen şunlardan birini seçin: JPG, JPEG, PNG, Gif, PDF
frozenAccountText: Hesabınız, güvenlik uyarısını tetikleyen en son etkinlik nedeniyle dondurulmuştur. Hesabınızı yeniden etkinleştirmek için Hesap Yöneticiniz kısa süre içinde sizinle iletişim kuracaktır. Verdiğimiz rahatsızlık için özür dileriz
openTradingAccountText: İlk işlem hesabınızı açmak için aşağıya tıklayın
check_filter: Yukarıdaki menüden işlemler filtresini kontrol edin
completeRegistration: Lütfen devam etmeden önce kaydı tamamlayın
smsVerificationText: Kısa doğrulama işlemi ve PIN kodunu içeren bir SMS mesajı almak için için lütfen telefon numaranızı (ülke kodu dahil) aşağıya girin

depositDemoContent: Para yatırabilmek için lütfen Canlı bir hesaba geçiniz

cancelWithdrawal: Geri çekme talebinizi iptal ettirmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?

emptyPspMessage: To perform a deposit, please contact your [BRAND NAME] Account Manager directly or [BRAND NAME] Support Team at manager@[BRAND NAME].com
tnc1: In order to proceed with your live account, please accept the
tnc2: , and confirm that you are over 18 year of age.
depositUnavailableContent: Your account manager will contact you shortly
downloadGoogleAuth: Download and install Google Authentication App
scanQRCodeGoogleAuth: Scan QR Code in Google Authenticator App
backupGAC: Be sure to backup this code! If you lose it, the process to unlock your account requires considerable time and verification.
enterYourOTP: To verify, please enter your one-time password
otp_description:
Enable stronger security for your trading account with both your password and your phone/browser.

Two-Factor authentication allows you to require a code from a device you own before you can login, this makes it much more difficult for someone to gain unauthorized access to your account. We currently support browser addon and app based 2FA.
withdrawComplianceText: In order to process your withdrawal request, you are required to fill the following compliance form and to upload your proof of identity and proof of residence documents
toThisDepositAddress: to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit
itIsRecommended: It is recommended you try a small amount before depositing a larger amount.
tin_more_long: SSN/TIN cannot be more than 50 characters long.
information_financial: This information is required by financial regulations and helps us to protect you and your money.
us_reportable: I am a US reportable citizen
usCitizenPopupBody: Please note that due to regulation reasons we do not process customers reporting to the US.
over_18_year_part1: I am over 18 years of age and confirm that I have read and agree with
loan_popup: It is not advisable to deposit funds that you are not able and prepared to lose. If you do not have any other source of funds we will not be able to open you a trading account.
repay_popup: Due to the complex nature of CFDs, we advise you not to trade with the objective of making money to repay important expenses as the risk of loss might be higher. If this is your objective we will not be able to open you a trading account.
sleep_popup: CFDs are highly complex and risky and are not appropriate for all traders especially persons who are risk averse or conservative. If this is your attitude to risk we will not be able to open you a trading account.
negative_scoring: Dear customer, Based on the information you have submitted, please note that you do not appear to posses the appropriate knowledge and experience to deal in the financial instruments and services our company offers, since these are considered as complex products. We are concerned you do not understand the risks involved. Therefore, we do not recommend you proceed with the opening of a live trading account and opened a demo account for you to review and gain some experience in our platform.
retail_customers: Dear customer, Based on the information you have submitted, we have opened a live trading account for you. Please note that in order to start with the trading activity, you will have to upload your documents located in the verification center.
regular_customers:
Dear %name%!

Thank you for providing us with the required information.

According to the information provided by you are eligible to receive Investment Advice and Portfolio Management services.

As disclosed in our Risk Disclosure Statement, trading Forex and CFDs is Very Speculative and Risky. Forex and CFDs are complex instrument tools that come with a high risk of losing money rapidly. You should carefully and thoroughly considered whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.
professional_customers:
Dear %name%!

Thank you for providing us with the required information.

According to the information provided by you are eligible to receive Investment Advice and Portfolio Management services. Additionally, we are happy to inform you that you were found fit to be classified as a professional client.

As disclosed in our Risk Disclosure Statement, trading Forex and CFDs is Very Speculative and Risky. Forex and CFDs are complex instrument tools that come with a high risk of losing money rapidly. You should carefully and thoroughly considered whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.
unfit_customers:
Dear %name%!

Thank you for providing us with the required information.

According to the information provided by you are eligible to receive Investment Advice and Portfolio Management services.

As disclosed in our Risk Disclosure Statement, trading Forex and CFDs is Very Speculative and Risky. Forex and CFDs are complex instrument tools that come with a high risk of losing money rapidly. You should carefully and thoroughly considered whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Our analysis of the information provided by you indicates that you are not fit to use our services. We are obliged to clearly point out and emphasize to you, that trading Forex and CFDs would not be appropriate for you. It would be wise for you that prior to trading Forex and CFDs you will gain knowledge and experience trading at a risk free environment. We invite you to use our Demo Trading Account and expose yourself to real market conditions without risking your money, prior to opening a Live Trading Account. Should you continue with a live account and make a deposit, kindly be aware that you may be exposing yourself to risks surpassing your knowledge and experience, and that your actions would be considered as acknowledgement the risks involved and an irrevocable confirmation that you chose to ignore our analysis.
selectAtLeastOneOption: Please select at least one option
need_doc_upload_help:
Need help with your documentation?
Check out our tutorial
referral_program_content:
Invite your friends to ${brandName}, earn rewards, and trade with even more funds!
Join our Referral Program, share your unique link, and receive funds for every new user that makes its first deposit.
For each new friend that you will introduce to ${brandName} - we will credit your account with real money.

All you have to do is share your unique invitation link, make sure that your friend signs up through it and make its first deposit. The bonus will appear in your account right away. The more friends you bring, the more money comes your way!
once_you_make_deposit:
Once your friends make a deposit,
you will see your earnings here
please_open_live_account: Please open live account to view this content
i_accept: I wish to continue with a Live Trading Account
questionnaireFill: Questionnaire completion is required per trading regulation guidelines, Click 'Continue' to fill the questionnaire
verification_text:
To comply with trading regulatory requirements and to protect you and us from acts of fraud, we need to verify your identity with relevant documents.

Once uploaded, the docs are in pending status and reviewed by one of our representatives. We make every effort to verify your account as quickly as possible.
all_set: No action is required at this point
account_approved1: We will let you know if we'll need any additional documents
requirement_description: Please select one of the topics below and upload accordingly
pending_text: Thanks for uploading the doc. Our team will review it soon
trading_experience: Do you have experience with investments?
trading_central_not_validated: Alım Satım Araçlarına erişmek için hesabınızda minimum %minTotalDeposit% olmalıdır
